        protected boolean executeUpdate(java.lang.String sql,
                    java.lang.Object... values)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Prepares and executes the SQL statement, which must be an insert, update or delete statement.
        Parameters:
        sql - The sql statement to be executed.
        values - Values to replace ? symbols in the sql string. The amount of variables must match the amount of ? symbols in the string.
        Returns:
        true if rows were affected, falseÂ otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        protected java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String sql,
                              java.lang.Object... values)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        sql - The sql statement to be executed.

        Returns:
        The resulting ResultSet.
